page.title: 08OUR INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is Prince Avenue Infants School.There is a unit in the school for children who can't hear.They have to wear hearing aids which help a little.There are 6 classes in the school and alot of mothers come in to cook,do the library book changes and help the teachers.We have a school secretary and a caretaker and four ladies who look after us at dinner time.Each day a different class has first choice at choosing dinner.We have a lot of land at our school and have a big playground,lots of grass and a pond with alot of creatures in it. Next to our school is another building that is the junior school.We will have to leave our school when we are seven and go to the juniors.We will have to stay there until we are eleven.
